original_title: MullenLowe demonstrates support to Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Senior Leadership S. Subramanyeswar (Subbu) – Chief Strategy Officer MullenLowe Asia Pacific & Global Chair, Group Chief Executive Officer MullenLowe India Vivek Kamath- Chief Operating Officer & Chief Financial Officer MullenLowe India and Helen Bell – Chief Operating Officer, IPG Team Unilever, will be visiting Sri Lanka for a series of client meetings and evening forums scheduled this week.

They are the senior most professionals from MullenLowe Group Worldwide (Inter Public Group) to visit Sri Lanka post the pandemic and the financial crisis to support the business and help clients rebound from the unfortunate setbacks the country has experienced in the recent past. Subbu will be speaking at the Bonvoy Marriott [Courtyard by Marriott Colombo] on the 29th of June at 6.30pm at an exclusive invitee only event and on the 30th of June at Ramada Hotel Colombo at an Association of Accredited Advertising Agency (4As) ticketed event.

MullenLowe Sri Lanka is one of the country’s foremost marketing communications companies driving change through its 8 strategic verticals by incorporating Strategic Creative, Technology, Media, Digital, Public Relations and Activations and will be exporting MarTech services to overseas markets by end of the year. The company has been top ranked regionally and globally on multiple occasions, including at Effies and named Effie Agency Of The Year in Sri Lanka.
